channel.title: Seriously some1 help

item.title: Seriously some1 help
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

in my npc death command in npchandler.java i cant have 2 temp.sendMessage or temp.addSkillXP

Why cant i have both???

when i add both of them i get spammed ingame after killing the npc look add this to your npchandler.java and try it please help:

if ((temp != null) && (!temp.disconnected)) { if (npcs[i].npcType == 1591) { temp.sendMessage("You have defeated the Dragon!"); temp.sendMessage("you have been given ultimate strength!"); temp.addSkillXP(2, 1000); }

Please help

Read full topic
